login.title: Login
login.description: Enter your email below to log in to your account.

general.title: Title
general.deleteConfirmation: This action cannot be undone. The service will be permanently deleted.
general.titleRequiredDesc: Please enter a title to generate a description.
general.generationFailedDesc: Unable to generate description at this time.
general.descriptionGeneratedDesc: A description was generated for you by AI.

messagesPage.title: Manage Messages
messagesPage.inboxDesc: Here are the messages sent through your contact form.

projectsPage.title: Manage Projects
projectsPage.projectsListDesc: Here are all the projects in your portfolio.
projectsPage.titleMin: Title must be at least two characters.
projectsPage.categoryMin: Category must be at least two characters.
projectsPage.descMin: Description must be at least 10 characters.
projectsPage.titleRequiredDesc: Please enter a title to generate a description.

teamPage.title: Manage Team
teamPage.teamListDesc: Here are all your team members.
teamPage.nameMin: Name must be at least two characters.
teamPage.roleMin: Role must be at least two characters.

servicesPage.servicesListDescription: Here are all the services you offer.
servicesPage.addServiceDescription: Fill in the details to add a new service.

testimonialsPage.title: Manage Testimonials
testimonialsPage.quoteMin: Quote must be at least 10 characters.
testimonialsPage.authorMin: Author name must be at least two characters.
testimonialsPage.roleMin: Role must be at least two characters.
testimonialsPage.authorRequiredDesc: Please enter the author name to generate a quote.

partnersPage.title: Manage Partners
partnersPage.partnersListDesc: Here are all partners displayed on your site.
partnersPage.nameMin: Name must be at least two characters.

settingsPage.title: Site Settings
settingsPage.statsDesc: Update the numbers shown in the "Why Choose Us" section.

themePage.title: Theme Settings
themePage.themeDesc: Customize the color palette for light and dark themes on your site.
